title: Kickoff Event
description: Annual FIRST Robotics Competition season kickoff. Game reveal and initial strategy session.

title: Build Season Begins
description: Daily build sessions to design, prototype, and construct the competition robot.

title: Week 1 Competition
description: First regional competition of the season. Three days of qualification and elimination matches.

title: Community Outreach
description: STEM demonstration and robot showcase for local elementary school students.

title: Practice Match Day
description: Full field practice with other local FRC teams. Driver training and strategy refinement.

title: Sponsor Appreciation Night
description: Thank you event for our sponsors. Robot demonstrations, team presentations, and networking.
